name: Munkidori
description: The Retainer Pokémon. The chain is made from toxins that enhance capabilities. It stimulated Munkidori's brain and caused the Pokémon's psychic powers to bloom.

abilities.name: Toxic Chain
abilities.description: When this Pokémon lands a hit against a target using a melee attack, the target must make a CON save DC 16, becoming badly poisoned on failure.

abilities.name: Frisk
abilities.description: Upon entering a battle, a single opponent’s held item is revealed, if it has one.
